message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $14,000. What are your thoughts?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to be within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your interest and offer.  While I understand your budget constraints, $9,000 is significantly below its true value. I could be willing to meet you halfway. How about $11,500?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $11,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,500, which is the closest I can get to my budget. I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
